name: The Hermit Experience
description:
An Interactive Environment based off of the Tarot Card the Hermit-the ninth trump of the set. The card describes already having found your path and continuing on it in order to achieve knowledge. Walk the path of the hermit in this visual experience.

Controls:

WASD - Move

Move Mouse - Toggle Camera

Hold + Shift - Sprint

Space Bar - Jump

R- Refresh

Esc - Close Application
